channel.title: Tips on CookieHookey
channel.description: Recent content in Tips on CookieHookey

item.title: Careful not to lose my050 number
item.description: Brastel’s my050 is now chargeable(application fee and maintenance fee) and requires personal identification documents for new applications. I once used another 050 number service, smatalk, and was automatically terminated without realizing it. So, Brastel users beware. According to the terms of service, if you are on the old plan (no maintenance fee), my050 will be terminated after one year of no charges or paid calls. If you use it, it will be extended for one year each time you use it.

item.title: Removing damp smell by detergent and bleach
item.description: Detergent and bleach Detergent 部屋干しトップ 除菌EX Bleach クリアヒーロー Softener as you like Usage Since it is a powder detergent, you should set the rinse cycle to 2. Also, cleaning the washing machine and ventilation/recirculation during drying laundry are important.

item.title: Calculating electricity prices
item.description: Calculation Formula Electricity bill = Power consumption (Wattage/watts) / 1000 * Hours of use (Hours) * Electricity rate per kWh (27 yen/kWh) Only Watt is requisite, so find Watt anyway. Note: Power consumption (Wattage/watts) = Pressure of the electricity (Voltage/volts) * Amount of electricity used (Ampere/amps) is also acceptable. For kWh, the standard unit price for electric power consumption set by Home Electric Appliances Fair Trade Conference is 27 yen/kWh (from 2014), now became 31 yen/kWh in 2022.
